example.name: Test REST API

get.summary: Gets the transactions for all cycles in the account

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Size of the page to get

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Only get transactions after or on this timestamp

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Only get transaction on or before this timestamp

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Allows you to limit the results to only Completed or InProgress transactions

parameters.name: splitType
parameters.description: Allows you to limit the results to only Split or Unsplit transactions

parameters.name: sortOrderAsc
parameters.description: True to sort in ascending order. False for descending order

get.summary: Gets the transactions for a cycle

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Size of the page to get

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for transaction data, will only get transactions containing matching data

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Only get transactions after or on this timestamp

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Only get transaction on or before this timestamp

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Allows you to limit the results to only Completed or InProgress transactions

parameters.name: splitType
parameters.description: Allows you to limit the results to only Split or Unsplit transactions

parameters.name: parentTransactionId
parameters.description: Limits the results to transactions split from this parent

parameters.name: transactionType
parameters.description: Limits the results to transactions matching the specified type(s).

CustomCategoryRequestModel.description: Model to create a Custom Category in an Account Connector.

CustomizableCategoryId.description: Id of the customizable category to copy

Object.description: Object type to use for the custom category

IsLookupValue.description: True if the object value is from the customizable category lookup method

CustomCategoryResponseModel.description: Model for an Account Connector Custom Category.

CustomizableCategoryId.description: Id of the customizable category to copy

Object.description: Object type to use for the custom category

IsLookupValue.description: True if the object value is from the customizable category lookup method

AuthValue.description:
Authentication value:
For Basic Authentication, this is the base64 encoded value of username and password;
For OAuth, this value is a serialized JSON object, e.g.
{"AccessToken":"access_token","RefreshToken":"refresh_token","Expires":"YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ","RefreshExpires":"YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ"}"

Authenticated.description: If the account connector is authenticated

IsPartnerIntegrationConnector.description:
If the connector is used to integrate connector engine with the host application.
If it is, the connector will have special handling applied to it

Properties.description: A collection of account connector properties

Icon.description: Base64 img data for the connector icon

AuthDescription.description: Authentication description. Deprecated. Please use Authentication instead.

AuthType.description: Authentication type. Deprecated. Please use Authentication instead.

OAuth2Type.description: OAuth 2 Type. Deprecated. Please use Authentication instead.

AuthScheme.description: Authentication scheme. Deprecated. Please use Authentication instead.

IsSystemConnector.description: Indicates if the connector is a system connector / Cyclr utility

Categories.description: Catagories that the connector a member of

PartnerSetupGuideUrl.description: URL to the partner setup guide.

Authentication.description: Available authentication options for the connector

AccountConnectorPropertyModel.description: Model for an account connector property

CustomFieldModel.description: Model for an account connector custom field

MethodUniqueIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for the method that this field is for

EntityIdentifier.description:
If this is a custom field for a method that has a MethodEntityIdentifier, this field will 
contain the {name:id} to restrict the field to

ForRequestFormat.description: True if field is for request format, false if for response format

ConnectorParameter.description: Model for a parameter in a connector

IsAccountConnectorProperty.description: Indicates if the parameter value must be set in an Account Connector

IsSensitive.description: Indicates if a connector level property will contain sensitive data

Id.description: Id of the field or parameter

IsOptional.description: Indicates if the field/parameter is optional or required

DataType.description: Data type of the field/parameter. Will always be string for parameters

TriggerName.description: The lookup trigger name for this field/parameter

Values.description: Drop down list values for the field/parameter

ConnectorAuthenticationModel.description: Web response model for connector authentication

AuthValue.description:
Authentication value:
For Basic Authentication, this is the base64 encoded value of username and password;
For OAuth, this value is a serialized JSON object, e.g.
{"AccessToken":"access_token","RefreshToken":"refresh_token","Expires":"YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ","RefreshExpires":"YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ"}"

IsPartnerIntegrationConnector.description:
If the connector is used to integrate connector engine with the host application.
If it is, the connector will have special handling applied to it

Message.description: Message confirming de-authentication of the connector

DeactivatedCycleIds.description: IDs of cycles which were deactivated during the de-authentication

MethodCallRequestModel.description: Request model for calling a method

MethodCallResponseModel.description: Response model for calling a method

Fields.description: Field ID and value from the call

HttpRequest.description: The raw http request that was made

HttpResponse.description: The raw http response that was received

CustomConnector.description: Response model for a custom connector

AccountSignInTokenRequest.description: Creates a sign in token for the account

Username.description: Username of the user the token should sign in

CreatedDate.description: UTC time and date that the account was created

AuditInfo.description: Optional account audit info for partner application

TaskAuditInfo.description: Optional task audit info for partner application

Timezone.description: Timezone for the account, IANA time zone database format

NextBillDateUtc.description:
UTC time and date for the next billing date in UTC
If not provided, it will default to a month after the current date

StepDataSuccessRetentionHours.description: Hours to retain transactions for cycles in this account after successful completion

StepDataErroredRetentionHours.description: Minutes to retain transactions for cycles in this account after an errored completion

TransactionErrorWebhookEnabled.description: Indicates if a transaction error notification webhook should be called for the account

TransactionErrorWebhookUrl.description: URL to send transaction error notifications to

TransactionErrorWebhookIncludeWarnings.description: When set to true will send warnings to the error webhook

Id.description: ID of the account the task usage is for

TasksUsed.description: The amount of tasks used in the period

StartTime.description: Start timestamp for the task usage

EndTime.description: End timestamp for the task usage

AccountLaunchModel.description: Model to create an account LAUNCH

RunOnce.description: True if the cycle to be launched should only be run once

Tags.description: List of tags that a cycle must have at least one of to appear in LAUNCH

AutoInstall.description: Set to false if you don't want Cyclr to automatically install the template when there's only one available

SingleInstall.description: Set to true for templates to only appear in LAUNCH if they haven't been installed in the account

Start.description: False if the launched cycle should not be started, True or not provided will start the launched cycle

InlineOAuth.description: Set to false for OAuth connector authentication to appear with signin button and popup

CompleteParameter.description: Additional parameter to pass to launch complete result.

Wizard.description: Set to true to display Launch mappings in a step by step wizard.

DisplayDescriptions.description: Set to true to display template description in launch.

PartnerConnector.description: The connector to install in the account. Only installed if new account

AccountName.description: The name of the account. Only set if creating a new account

AccountDescription.description: A description of the account. Only set if creating a new account

UserLaunchPartnerConnector.description: The connector to install in the account. Only installed if new account

Name.description: Name of the connector to install

Version.description: Version of the connector to install

For Basic Authentication, this is the base64 encoded value of username and password;
For OAuth, this value is a serialized JSON object, e.g.

UserLaunchModel.description: Model to create a user LAUNCH

RunOnce.description: True if the cycle to be launched should only be run once

Tags.description: List of tags that a cycle must have at least one of to appear in LAUNCH

AutoInstall.description: Set to false if you don't want Cyclr to automatically install the template when there's only one available

SingleInstall.description: Set to true for templates to only appear in LAUNCH if they haven't been installed in the account

Start.description: False if the launched cycle should not be started, True or not provided will start the launched cycle

InlineOAuth.description: Set to false for OAuth connector authentication to appear with signin button and popup

CompleteParameter.description: Additional parameter to pass to launch complete result.

Wizard.description: Set to true to display Launch mappings in a step by step wizard.

DisplayDescriptions.description: Set to true to display template description in launch.

PartnerConnector.description: The connector to install in the account. Only installed if new account

AccountDescription.description: A description of the account. Only set if creating a new account

clientcredentials.description: Use the client ID and client secret from the Cyclr console

oauth2.description: Password Grant is no longer the recommended way to Authenticate with the Cyclr API. You should migrate to Client Credentials. Use the Password Grant client ID from the console. Leave client secret blank. User must be a partner administrator.
